question.body: Which of the following, seemingly unrelated medical conditions, is impacted by reduced kidney function?

multiple_choice.choice: wrinkling of the skin and hair loss
altered oxygen exchange in the lungs
hardening of the major cardiovascular vessels

response.feedback: Correct. Doctors often need to adjust levels of pharmaceuticals to compensate for kidney dysfunction.
Incorrect. The kidney has no direct impact on skin elasticity of hair retention.
Incorrect. Kidney function has no impact on gas exchange in the lungs.
Incorrect. Kidney function does not have a major impact on blood cholesterol or triglycerides.
